column4: hello, I am new to ubuntu as well as to conky, I dont know I modified the following script properly, need assistance http://pastebin.com/m1JLajfg

I am loading the conky script Dweezahr
do you have some simple conky script that I can try?
and can you tell what is conky.conf file? I dont have it!
find a sample config online and copy it in the ~/.conkyrc file  it will be read and used
what's good about conky is the file is read in line, so changes apply without restarting the app
